properties.name: Citi Lounge
properties.location:
Citi Lounge, 9 Mabo St, Surulere
Lagos 101283, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: Citi Lounge is a vibrant establishment in Surulere, Lagos, offering a lively atmosphere with a mix of local and international dishes. The menu features items such as jollof rice, pasta, and grilled fish. The venue is known for its energetic ambiance, with a DJ playing music that keeps patrons entertained. While the food is praised for its quality, some reviews mention that service can be slow during peak times. Parking can be challenging, but arrangements are made with a nearby school to accommodate guests. Overall, Citi Lounge provides a dynamic setting for dining and socializing.

properties.name: Pancake Hub
properties.location:
17 Jibowu St, Jibowu
Lagos 101212, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: Pancake Hub is a family-run restaurant specializing in pancakes, located at 17 Jibowu Street, Jibowu, Lagos 101212, Nigeria. Established in 2015, it offers a variety of pancake options with unique toppings such as chicken wings, cheese, bacon, eggs, sausage, chocolate drippings, fruits, and shredded beef. The outdoor seating area provides a serene and intimate atmosphere, shaded by trees and surrounded by greenery. The restaurant is known for its friendly staff and quick service, making it a popular spot for breakfast and brunch in Lagos.

properties.name: Kaanubaru
properties.location:
20 Fola Jinadu Cres, Pedro
Lagos 102216, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: Kaanubaru is a unique restaurant located at 20 Fola Jinadu Crescent, Gbagada, Lagos, Nigeria. It offers a modern experimental twist on traditional Nigerian dishes, creating fresh and flavorful one-of-a-kind recipes. The ambiance is playful and inspired by local soul food, providing a novel culinary experience that won't break the bank. The restaurant serves artfully presented and delicious dishes at modest prices, making it a Mainland treasure.

properties.name: La Branco Restaurant
properties.location:
Plot 293 Gbagada - Oworonshoki Expy, Gbagada Phase II
Lagos 100234, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: La Branco Restaurant, located at Plot 293 Gbagada - Oworonshoki Expy, Gbagada Phase II, Lagos, Nigeria, offers a diverse menu featuring both African and continental cuisines. The restaurant is known for its cozy indoor setup and outdoor seating, providing a comfortable dining experience. Signature dishes include the creamy seafood pasta and the sweet sensation drink. While the ambiance is appreciated, some patrons have noted that service can be slow during peak hours. The establishment operates 24 hours a day, accommodating guests at any time.

properties.name: Kings Tower
properties.location:
24 Glover Rd, Ikoyi
Lagos 106104, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: Kings Tower is a striking architectural feature located in the upscale neighborhood of Ikoyi, Lagos. This impressive high-rise stands out in the city skyline and is often associated with luxury and modern living. It offers stunning views of the surrounding areas, making it a popular spot for both locals and tourists. The tower symbolizes the rapid development of Lagos, showcasing the blend of contemporary design with the vibrant culture of Nigeria. Its location provides easy access to various amenities, including restaurants and shopping, enhancing its appeal as a travel destination.

properties.name: Ikoyi Club 1938 Golf Course
properties.location:
6 Ikoyi Club 1938 Rd, Ikoyi
Lagos 106104, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: Ikoyi Club 1938 Golf Course is a prestigious golf course situated in Ikoyi, Lagos, Nigeria. Established in 1938, it offers a challenging 18-hole course set in lush greenery, making it a favorite among local and visiting golfers. The club provides various amenities, including a pro shop, dining options, and social activities, fostering a vibrant community atmosphere. Golfers of all levels can enjoy the course's beautiful landscape and well-maintained facilities, making it a key destination for golf enthusiasts in Lagos.

properties.name: Eric Kayser
properties.location:
9 Osborne Rd, Ikoyi
Lagos 106104, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: Eric Kayser - Ikoyi is an artisanal French bakery and caf√© offering a variety of handmade breads, pastries, cakes, Italian gelato, and French bistro dishes. The establishment features a children's play area, making it convenient for families to enjoy brunch together.

properties.name: Omenka Gallery
properties.location: 24 Modupe Alakija Cres, Ikoyi Lagos 106104, Lagos Nigeria
properties.description: Omenka Gallery is a prominent art gallery that specializes in contemporary African art. Located in the upscale neighborhood of Ikoyi in Lagos, Nigeria, it serves as a vital platform for artists from across the continent. The gallery hosts a variety of exhibitions, featuring works in diverse media such as painting, sculpture, photography, and mixed media. Omenka Gallery is also involved in publishing and art consultancy, contributing to the broader discourse on African art. Its exhibitions often explore themes relevant to African identity, culture, and history, making it a key player in the global art scene.

properties.name: Kingfisher Africa
properties.location:
1 Wole Olateju Cres, LGA, off Admiralty Way, Lekki Phase 1
Lagos 106104, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: Kingfisher Africa is a premium seafood restaurant situated along the Lekki waterfront in Lagos, Nigeria. The venue features an open-air design with expansive waterfront views, creating a relaxed yet sophisticated setting. The menu offers a variety of seafood dishes, including grilled lobster, seafood platters, seafood paella, and grilled fish, as well as hearty meat options like T-bone steaks, lamb chops, and Tomahawk steak. Pasta dishes such as Penne Marinara and Carbonara are also available. The restaurant provides a versatile experience, from romantic date nights indoors to casual waterside dining accompanied by soft live music. It operates daily from around midday into the late evening or early hours.

properties.name: Farmcity Lekki lounge
properties.location:
15 Admiralty Wy, Lekki Phase I
Lekki 106104, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: Farmcity Lekki Lounge is a waterfront restaurant and bar situated at 15 Admiralty Way, Lekki Phase I, Lagos, Nigeria. The establishment offers both indoor and outdoor seating with scenic views of the Lagos Lagoon, making it ideal for casual dining, hangouts, and night outings. The menu features a blend of Nigerian and continental dishes, including grilled fish, shawarma, suya, jollof rice, and local soups. Known for its lively ambiance, the lounge often hosts live music and evening DJ sessions. It's family-friendly during the day and transforms into a vibrant social spot at night. While the service is generally good, peak times may cause delays. Prices are moderate with generous portions, making it a great value for waterfront dining in Lagos.

properties.name: Bics Boat Club (Bics Garden)
properties.location:
B20 Wole Olateju Cres, Lekki Phase 1
Lekki 106104, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: Bics Boat Club, situated in Lekki Phase 1, offers a serene escape with its beautiful gardens and waterfront views. It serves as a hub for boating activities and relaxation, featuring a variety of outdoor spaces where guests can unwind. The club provides facilities for picnics, social gatherings, and events, making it a favored destination for those looking to enjoy leisure time in a scenic environment. Its combination of natural beauty and recreational facilities creates a unique atmosphere for visitors.

properties.name: Affinity Gallery
properties.location:
1-7 Muri Okunola St, Victoria Island
Lagos 101241, Lagos
Nigeria

properties.name: La Taverna
properties.location:
48 Balarabe Musa Cres, Victoria Island
Lagos 23401, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: La Taverna Lagos is a cozy restaurant located at 48 Balarabe Musa Crescent, Victoria Island, Lagos, Nigeria. It specializes in Spanish, Italian, and Chilean cuisines, offering a variety of dishes such as tapas, paella, and pizzas. The establishment provides both indoor and outdoor seating options, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. La Taverna Lagos also hosts special events like ladies' night and offers meal deals on select days, enhancing the dining experience for its patrons.

properties.name: Salma's Authentic Lebanese Cuisine
properties.location:
20/24 Ozumba Mbadiwe Ave, Victoria Island
Lagos 106104, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: Salma's Authentic Lebanese Cuisine offers a rich array of Lebanese dishes, including mezze like hummus, tabbouleh, and falafel, as well as main courses such as shawarma, kofta, and shish taouk. A standout is the Mansaf Lamb, tender lamb cooked with yogurt and served over fragrant rice. Desserts like baklava and knafeh provide a sweet conclusion to the meal. The restaurant's decor blends modern design with traditional Lebanese elements, featuring intricate mosaic tiles, ornate lanterns, and rich fabrics, creating an inviting atmosphere.

properties.name: NOK by Alara
properties.location:
12A Akin Olugbade St, Victoria Island
Lagos 106104, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: NOK by Alara is a contemporary African restaurant located in Victoria Island, Lagos. The restaurant offers a unique fusion of traditional Nigerian flavors and modern culinary techniques, reinventing classic African dishes with innovative twists. The dining space is set within a lush, bamboo-framed garden, creating an intimate atmosphere adorned with contemporary African art and design. Signature dishes include the "Nok Special Jollof," a modern take on the beloved Nigerian dish, and "Efo Riro," a luxurious spinach and seafood stew served with pounded yam. The restaurant also features an outdoor lounge, ideal for casual dining or enjoying cocktails under the open sky.

properties.name: RSVP restaurant
properties.location:
9 Eletu Ogabi St, Victoria Island
Lagos 101001, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: RSVP is a New American restaurant and bar in Victoria Island, Lagos, inspired by the prohibition-era establishments of Manhattan. Opened in 2014, it offers a menu featuring fresh, in-house made dishes without preservatives or artificial coloring. The restaurant's industrial luxury design complements its hidden bar and lounge, creating a sophisticated dining experience. In 2015, RSVP introduced The Poolside, an outdoor bar and lounge offering a more casual atmosphere with live music and entertainment. The venue is suitable for both intimate dinners and large group gatherings, accommodating up to 15 people with set menus or cocktail receptions.

properties.name: Kuramo Beach
properties.location:
Kuramo Beach, 1411 Adetokunbo Ademola Street, Victoria Island
Lagos 106104, Lagos
Nigeria
properties.description: Kuramo Beach, situated on the southern side of Victoria Island in Lagos, Nigeria, is a sandy beach located just east of Bar Beach and south of the Kuramo Waters lagoon. Historically, the area was known for numerous shanties and cabins, some of which were used for music entertainment, bars, and other activities. In August 2012, a surge of the Atlantic Ocean hit Kuramo Beach, destroying some of these structures and resulting in fatalities. Following this event, government authorities evacuated the area, demolished the remaining shacks, and began to refill the sand. The beach has experienced consistent erosion over the years, with sea-level rise contributing to shoreline development. The surrounding area has been described as unkempt, with dirt and waste present at various corners of the beach.
